title: Bug Splat 6.16
body: Is anyone else getting constant bug splats as they start to enter a game post patch 6.16?

replies.body: Errors like this can be due to corrupt game files that's failing to render the game properly.  I suggest going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up for good.  Let me know if you have any question!

I am having similar issues since 6.16 and 6.15. Game crashes 4-5 seconds into loading screen. Restarting my computer and running repair is the only way to get me back into the game (7-10 mins late). 

I have reinstalled the game and have done a factory reset on my windows trying to fix the issue but no luck. I have looked over the bugsplat and game crash guide and have done everything that the reinstalation and factory reset does not cover and still nothing. I have had the same computer setup for about 6 months with no issues like this. Other games and programs on my computer do not have an issue like this. 

What is the next recommended step in resolving this?
